member.name: M:RandomPersonLib.ValidatePerson.ValidateSSN(RandomPersonLib.Country,System.String)
member.summary: Validate an SSN for a given country.
member.param: The country of the person to validate SSN for.
member.returns: Tuple, with first value true if valid SSN, false otherwise; second value is the error message if false.

member.name: M:RandomPersonLib.ValidatePerson.ValidatePAN(System.String)
member.summary: Validate a primary account number (PAN) for a credit card.
member.returns: Tuple, with first value true if valid PAN, false otherwise; second value is the error message if false.

member.summary: Create a list of strings given a template string where certain values will be replaced.
member.param: Number of people to create data for.
The country of the person to generate data for.
The string to use as template for generated data.
member.returns: A list of strings containing random data.
